body.name: GuruNanda Dual Barrel Oxyburst Whitening Mouthwash - Contains Hydrogen Peroxide to Promote Whiter Teeth - Alcohol & Fluoride Free Rinse with 100% Natural Essential Oils, Wild Mint Flavor - 20 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 51 mins
features: ADVANCED ORAL CARE SOLUTION: GuruNanda Whitening Mouthwash, based on Ayurvedic principles, is a fluoride-free, dual-chamber formula. Hydrogen peroxide, natural ingredients, and vitamins combine to help with bad breath and teeth stains, promoting oral hygiene and whiter teeth through Oxy-burst technology.

NATURAL BLEND OF ESSENTIAL OILS: Our mouthwash contains a unique blend of 100% pure essential oils and vitamins for complete oral hygiene. Spearmint, peppermint, cardamom, and fennel oils provide fresh breath, while clove, oregano, and tea tree support teeth and gum health. Essential vitamins D, E, and K2 are included for overall oral health.

HYDROGEN PEROXIDE FOR TEETH WHITENING: Use 15ml from both compartments, rinse, gargle for 1 minute, and spit. The blend of essential oils and hydrogen peroxide creates enamel-safe Oxy-burst bubbles to effectively remove teeth stains. Each bottle contains 20 Fl Oz for a clean mouth.

TRUSTWORTHY & PREMIUM QUALITY MOUTHWASH: Our fluoride-free mouthwash is free from harmful chemicals, preservatives, artificial flavors, and CPC ingredients. Dentist-recommended and safe for daily use, it's ideal for long-term oral care.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: GuruNanda Dual Barrel mouthwash is proudly made in the USA, with a commitment to ethical sourcing of essential oils and natural ingredients. We prioritize safety and unique experiences for our customers.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dual Barrel Mouthwash Concentrated Mouthwash Original Oil Pulling Mouthwash Advanced Formula Oil Pulling Mouthwash OxyBurst Teeth Whitening Mouthwash Promotes whiter teeth & fresh breath ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Supports Healthy Gums ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Hydrogen peroxide whitening ✓ - - - ✓ Long Lasting Fresh Taste Wild Mint Flavor Wild Mint Flavor - Extra Minty + Fennel Essential Oil Wild Mint Flavor Key Ingredients Hydrogen peroxide with 7 Essential Oils (Spearmint, peppermint, clove, cardamom, fennel, oregano and tea tree) and Vitamins D, E & K2 Clove, Oregano, and Spearmint Essential Oils, Vitamin D& E Sunflower, Sesame, Fractionated Coconut, Peppermint Oil Sunflower, Sesame, Fractionated Coconut, Peppermint, Fennel, Tea Tree, Cardamom, Oregano, Clove & Spearmint Essential Oils, Vitamin E, Vitamin D Vitamins E & D, Hydrogen Peroxide, Aloe Vera, Castor Oil, Clove Oil, Peppermint Oil, Cardamom Oil, Fennel Oil, Tea Tree Oil, Oregano Oil, Jasmine Oil Non GMO, No Preservatives, No Artificial Flavors, No Artificial Colors ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Alcohol, Fluoride & Cruelty- Free ✓ Less than 1% alcohol in every swish ✓ ✓ ✓ Need to mix with water - add 4 drops to 15 mL of water - - - Up to 300 uses (rinses) - ✓ - - -

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing and Pure!
reviews.reviewText: I've been on the lookout for an all-natural mouthwash, and this product has been a fantastic find! Made with ingredients that I can actually pronounce, it offers a refreshing clean without the harsh chemicals found in traditional mouthwashes.The taste is pleasantly mild, with a hint of natural mint that leaves my mouth feeling fresh without the overwhelming burn. It's reassuring to know that I'm not exposing myself to any unnecessary additives or artificial flavors.I've noticed a significant improvement in my oral health since I started using this mouthwash. My gums feel healthier, and my breath stays fresh longer. It's great to have an effective, natural alternative that supports my wellness goals.The eco-friendly packaging is a thoughtful touch, aligning with the product's natural ethos. It's clear that the makers of this mouthwash are committed not only to oral health but also to environmental sustainability.Overall, this all-natural mouthwash is a standout choice for anyone looking to maintain their oral hygiene with clean, sustainable ingredients. It's a refreshing part of my daily routine that I feel good about, and I highly recommend it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I gifted a bottle to my husband, and upon trying it immediately, he was greatly impressed by the results. After using it a few times, his teeth are noticeably whiter, and I can even observe positive changes in his gum lines. Though I hadn't used it in a while, I tried it last night and noticed an instant difference as well. This product has a great taste, is all-natural, alcohol, and fluoride-free, and is beneficial for oral health and the mouth microbiome due to its high pH level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm currently on my second bottle of GuruNanda Whitening Mouthwash with Hydrogen Peroxide, and I must say, it's been a delightful addition to my oral care routine. One of the standout features of this mouthwash is its taste. It's surprisingly delicious for a mouthwash, making the twice-daily routine something to look forward to. But don't worry, I haven't been tempted to drink it – I'm sticking to sipping my coffee and leaving the mouthwash for rinsing!As for the teeth whitening, I'm sure it works, although I pair it with whitening strips and a pretty consistent brushing schedule. and the alcohol and fluoride free is another plus for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a small mouth. One is supposed to fill product in provided cap to 1/4 capful. That is too much for my mouth. I had a hard time with that much in my mouth. I will be doing 1/8 capful. This unexpectedly will last longer as well. As for white teeth. Only tried it once- but have fresh breath!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good.
reviews.reviewText: I haven’t really noticed a difference yet but it has a nice clean flavor and my teeth feel great. Gentle on my gums. Only thing I don’t like is it leaves a film on my tongue. I scrap my tongue before use and after because of the film.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have never had my mouth feel so clean!! This mouthwash is amazing and doesn’t burn. It is here for a great price as well. GET IT!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best mouthwash out there!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried many other mouthwash, but this one is different. It feels great to use and leaves my mouth and breath with a coconuty aroma. It’s the best I’ve had so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for oil pulling regime
reviews.reviewText: This is the last product I use for my oral routine and it leaves my breath fresh for hours. Avoids morning breath when used before bed and kills bacteria. Can’t say enough good things about this brand!
